activities.name: ConsultarDatosINEGI
activities.description: Hacer una llamada al API de INEGI para traer información de las tiendas del país.

activities.name: ObtenerListaArchivos
activities.description: Obtener lista de archivos dentro del folder de Usuarios.

activities.name: EnviarHaciaArchive
activities.description: Enviar los archivos de la carpeta USUARIOS en zona plata a archive para llevar un historial.

activities.name: EliminarArchivosAnteriores
activities.description: Eliminar los archivos de la carpeta USUARIOS que se acaban de pasar a ARCHIVE

properties.description: Crea un archivo con los mensajes que se enviaran a los nuevos usuarios.

activities.name: EjecutarPromociones
activities.description: Ejecutar notebook de Promociones para generar mensaje para usuarios nuevos.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Year as integer
}
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Date as date,
		Zip as integer,
		Units as short,
		Revenue as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSTZVentas
source(output(
		ManufacturerID as string,
		ManufacturerIDok as string,
		Manufacturer as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DSTZManufacturer
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Product as string,
		Segment as string,
		Category as string,
		ManufacturerID as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DSTZProduct
DSTZVentas, JoinProductManufacturer join(DSTZVentas@ProductID == DerivedColumn1@ProductID,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinVentasManufacturer
DerivedColumn1, DSTZManufacturer join(DerivedColumn1@ManufacturerID == ManufacturerIDok,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductManufacturer
JoinProductManufacturer select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Product,
		Segment,
		Category,
		ManufacturerID = DerivedColumn1@ManufacturerID,
		Price,
		ManufacturerID = DSTZManufacturer@ManufacturerID,
		ManufacturerIDok,
		Manufacturer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
DSTZProduct derive(ProductID = ProductID,
		Product = Product,
		Segment = Segment,
		Category = Category,
		ManufacturerID = ManufacturerID,
		Price = toDecimal(Price)) ~> DerivedColumn1
LeftJoinVentasManufacturer select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = DSTZVentas@ProductID,
		Date,
		Zip,
		Units,
		Revenue,
		ProductID = DerivedColumn1@ProductID,
		Product,
		Segment,
		Category,
		ManufacturerID = DerivedColumn1@ManufacturerID,
		Price,
		ManufacturerID = DSTZManufacturer@ManufacturerID,
		ManufacturerIDok,
		Manufacturer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Category,
		Segment,
		ProductID,
		Product),
	Revenue = sum(Revenue)) ~> AggProduct
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Manufacturer,
		Year = toString(year(Date)),
		Month = toString(month(Date))),
	Revenue = sum(Revenue)) ~> AggManufacturer
AggManufacturer sort(asc(Manufacturer, true),
	asc(Year, true),
	asc(Month, true)) ~> Sort1
AggProduct sort(desc(Revenue, true)) ~> Sort2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('ASE_ReporteVentas_',toString($Year),'.CSV'))],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Date,
		Zip,
		Units,
		Revenue,
		Product,
		Segment,
		Category,
		ManufacturerID,
		Price,
		ManufacturerIDok,
		Manufacturer
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkRepxCompleto
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('ASE_RepVentasAggManuf_',toString($Year),'.CSV'))],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkAggManufacturer
Sort2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('ASE_RepVentasAggProd_',toString($Year),'.CSV'))],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkAggProduct
